name: CMD and CTRL: Shortcut Heroes
description:
CMD and CTRL want to be true Shortcut Heroes! In order to achieve that, they must collect all of the Keys. Only then will they unlock their true Functionality.

The two share a special bond: going Out of Control! 
Going Out of Control will put you In CMD and going  Out of Command will put you back In  CTRL.

CTRL can use his laptop to help out CMD by enabling platforms she can stand on.
CMD can use her laptop to help out CTRL by enabling his platforms.

Collect the Key in each level to progress to the next one and try to stick together!

Tips:
- Late jumping is useful (walk off a platform and then press the jump button)
- CTRL and CMD can stand on each other to reach higher platforms
- When in doubt, just jump

Browser version playable at:
https://tunzor.github.io/cmd-and-ctrl/

Music credit:

Made in 48 hours as part of the GMTK 2020 Game Jam
